revised_title: Properties and Handling of Hydrofluoric Acid
tldr: The author describes the process of obtaining hydrofluoric acid and its properties. Hydrofluoric acid is a highly dangerous substance that can be obtained by heating dry double fluoride of hydrogen and potassium. It is a colorless and transparent liquid that must be handled with extreme care due to its corrosive nature. The author also discusses various methods for analyzing the anhydrous acid and its reactions with other compounds.
